languages.text: "Ничего удивительного. Кунрад уже уличен в сговоре с культистами. По его вине погибла Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус, и чуть не погибли вы сами. Предать Империум вновь, на сей раз побратавшись с ксеносами, едва ли для него сложнее утреннего туалета".

traits.locale_text: "Ничего удивительного. Кунрад уже уличен в сговоре с культистами. По его вине погибла Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус, и чуть не погибли вы сами. Предать Империум вновь, на сей раз побратавшись с ксеносами, едва ли для него сложнее утреннего туалета".
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."
languages.original_text: "Ничего удивительного. Кунрад уже уличен в сговоре с культистами. По его вине погибла Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус, и чуть не погибли вы сами. Предать Империум вновь, на сей раз побратавшись с ксеносами, едва ли для него сложнее утреннего туалета".

traits.locale_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius, and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time by fraternising with xenos, must have been as much of a challenge for him as his morning routine."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius, and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time by fraternising with xenos, must have been as much of a challenge for him as his morning routine."

He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

traits.locale_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: « Cela n'a rien de surprenant. Son lien avec les cultistes a déjà été démontré. Il est responsable de la mort de Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius et a bien failli vous tuer, vous aussi. Une nouvelle trahison de l'Imperium, cette fois en fraternisant avec des xénos, mais j'imagine qu'il est pour lui aussi facile de commettre de tels crimes que de se lever le matin. »
languages.original_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."

traits.locale_text: « Cela n'a rien de surprenant. Son lien avec les cultistes a déjà été démontré. Il est responsable de la mort de Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius et a bien failli vous tuer, vous aussi. Une nouvelle trahison de l'Imperium, cette fois en fraternisant avec des xénos, mais j'imagine qu'il est pour lui aussi facile de commettre de tels crimes que de se lever le matin. »
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: “这恐怕并不让人意外，我们都知道他和邪教徒狼狈为奸。他不仅杀害了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人，还差点要了您的命。如今，他再次背叛了帝国，和那群异形称兄道弟。不过对他而言，背叛帝国的恶行恐怕就像早上起床一样寻常不过。”
languages.original_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕并不让人意外，我们都知道他和邪教徒狼狈为奸。他不仅杀害了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人，还差点要了您的命。如今，他再次背叛了帝国，和那群异形称兄道弟。不过对他而言，背叛帝国的恶行恐怕就像早上起床一样寻常不过。”
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: 「驚くには値しません。教団との繋がりはすでに立証されています。彼はシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の死に責任があり、あなたの命をも奪おうとしていました。またしても帝国を裏切り、今度は異種族と結託するとは…ですが、彼にとってはそのような犯罪、朝起きるくらいに簡単なことだったのでしょうな」
languages.original_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."

traits.locale_text: 「驚くには値しません。教団との繋がりはすでに立証されています。彼はシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の死に責任があり、あなたの命をも奪おうとしていました。またしても帝国を裏切り、今度は異種族と結託するとは…ですが、彼にとってはそのような犯罪、朝起きるくらいに簡単なことだったのでしょうな」
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Das wundert mich nicht. Wir wussten bereits, dass es zwischen ihm und den Kultisten eine Verbindung gibt. Er ist verantwortlich für den Tod Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius und hätte beinahe auch für Euren Tod gesorgt. Ein weiterer Verrat am Imperium, in diesem Fall durch die Verbrüderung mit Xenos ... wobei ihm derartige Verbrechen ebenso leicht zu fallen scheinen, wie morgens aufzustehen."
languages.original_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."

traits.locale_text: "Das wundert mich eigentlich nicht. Wir wussten bereits, dass es zwischen ihm und den Kultisten eine Verbindung gibt. Er ist verantwortlich für den Tod Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius und hätte beinahe auch für Euren Tod gesorgt. Ein weiterer Verrat am Imperium, dieses Mal, indem er sich mit den Xenos verbrüdert hat. Das muss ihm so leicht gefallen sein, wie früh morgens aufzustehen und seinen Gepflogenheiten nachzugehen."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: «No me sorprende. Su relación con los sectarios ya se ha puesto de manifiesto. Sobre él recae la culpa de la muerte de mi señora Theodora von Valancius, y a punto ha estado de cobrarse también la suya. Traicionar de nuevo al Imperium, esta vez confraternizando con xenos, le habrá resultado tan sencillo como despertarse por la mañana».
languages.original_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."

traits.locale_text: «No me sorprende. Su relación con los sectarios ya se ha puesto de manifiesto. Sobre él recae la culpa de la muerte de mi señora Theodora von Valancius, y a punto ha estado de cobrarse también la suya. Traicionar de nuevo al Imperium, esta vez confraternizando con xenos, le habrá resultado tan sencillo como despertarse por la mañana».
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Hiç şaşırtıcı değil. Tarikatçılarla olan bağlantısı zaten açıklığa kavuşmuştu. Leydi Theodora von Valancius Hazretleri'nin ölümünden o sorumlu, neredeyse sizin de hayatınıza kastedecekti. Zenolarla dostluk kurması, İmparatorluk'a karşı gerçekleştirdiği ihanetlerin bir yenisi sadece. Tabii bu tip suçlar işlemek, artık ona sabahları uyanmak kadar doğal geliyordur."
languages.original_text: "That is hardly surprising. His connection to cultists has already been established. He is to blame for the death of Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius and he came close to taking your life as well. Another betrayal of the Imperium, this time fraternising with xenos — although such crimes must come as easy to him as getting up in the morning."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hiç şaşırtıcı değil. Tarikatçılarla olan bağlantısı zaten açıklığa kavuşmuştu. Leydi Hazretleri Theodora von Valancius'un ölümünden o sorumlu ve neredeyse sizin de hayatınıza kastedecekti. Zenolarla dostluk kurması, İmparatorluk'a karşı gerçekleştirdiği ihanetlerin bir yenisi sadece. Tabii bu tip suçlar işlemek, artık ona sabahları uyanmak kadar doğal geliyordur."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr
